description.string: Available error type resource provides error types used in NSS.

description.string: The region resource provides regions that are currently in use by NSS.
Returns a list of all regions in nss.

description.string: The regression region resource represents the region equations or rather the region in which the equation were created.

description.string: The Scenario resource represents the available grouped regional statistics and metadata/parameters needed to compute for the region. Scenario resources are intended to be used as a template type object whereas regression region parameters can be populated and passed back to the services within the body of the execute request.
Returns a list of scenarios.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Region 2 letter abbrev or ID of requested region.

parameters.name: regressionregions
parameters.description: Comma separated list of regression region ID's or code parameters to limit scenario list.

parameters.name: statisticgroups
parameters.description: Comma separated list of statistic group ID's or code parameters to limit scenario list.

parameters.name: regressiontypes
parameters.description: Comma separated list of regression type ID's or code parameters to limit scenario list.

parameters.name: unitsystems
parameters.description: ID representing the measuring unit system, 1=Metric, 2=US Customary, 3=Universal.
